location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J Stewart, Assistant at the Camp at Mohumrah, to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from J Stewart, Assistant at the Camp at Mohumrah [Mohammerah, Iran], to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter dated 19 December 1808, containing a list of articles that were delivered to the camp, and requesting Bruce to provide information on some missing pistols and brocades 'khimkhubs'.
